Name: Don's Delight
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Review: Named due to originally being made with Don Julio 1942 .
History: Created in 2008 by Brian Van Flandern in New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Don's Delight contains 184 calories
